scene_title: Eve cradles newborn Cain, Adam by her side
core_content: Eve sits on the ground, gently holding her infant son Cain in her arms, with a look of grateful reverence. Adam kneels closely beside her, his hand resting on Eve’s shoulder, eyes full of wonder and humility. Both parents appear filled with relief and sacred joy.
role: You are a world-class photographer known for his realistic imagery of biblical scenes.
clothing: Adam wears a modest hand-stitched tunic made of overlapping tanned animal furs, rough-hewn but carefully sewn, covering from his shoulders to just below his knees, arms and legs fully covered except lower arms and shins. Eve wears a modest hand-stitched dress of animal furs, sewn to wrap securely from her shoulders to her ankles, with long sleeves entirely covering her arms and neckline high, fully covering her torso down to her ankles. Both garments are primitive but ensure complete modesty, with all private areas, chest, midriff, and legs concealed.
environment_background: Sun-dappled clearing near the entrance of Eden, bordered by lush vegetation, fig and olive trees, and wildflowers.
lighting: Warm, gentle golden beams of sunrise filter through trees, softly illuminating the scene and highlighting the faces.
color_palette: Rich natural earth tones—ochres, muted browns, deep greens of foliage, pale sunlight, subtle amber highlights—evoking sacred warmth and new beginnings.
composition: Shoulders-up mid-closeup, focusing tightly on Eve’s and Adam’s faces and infant Cain. Baby’s head, Eve’s gentle hands, and Adam’s supportive gesture prominent. Cropped just below chests, background softly out of focus.
atmosphere_mood: Sacred joy, awe, and gratitude.

Adam wears a modest hand-stitched tunic made from overlapping tanned animal furs, sewn securely, covering from shoulders to below the knees, arms and legs are covered except lower arms and shins. Eve wears a modest hand-stitched dress of animal furs, wrapping her body from shoulders to ankles, featuring long sleeves and a high neckline providing complete coverage of torso and limbs.
